meanings.sent1: In the pagandom, they celebrate nature and the changing seasons.
meanings.sent2: Many people in the pagandom gather to honor the ancient gods.
meanings.sent3: The pagandom had a potluck picnic to enjoy the sunshine together.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a tiny leaf in the vast pagandom of believers.
meanings.sent5: The pagandom was like a colorful tapestry woven with different traditions.

meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of pagans.
meanings.sent1: Her pagandom includes rituals to connect with the earth and its energies.
meanings.sent2: Studying the pagandom helps us understand ancient spiritual practices.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said his pagandom involved dancing under the full moon.
meanings.sent4: The pagandom is a rich tapestry of diverse spiritual beliefs.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the pagandom opened her eyes to new ways of seeing the world.
